title: Final Fantasy 14's next expansion Dawntrail is out next year, and it's coming to Xbox, too
description: Producer/director Naoki Yoshida confirmed that the fifth expansion is set to launch in Q3 2024.

title: This classic RTS has been brought back to life "to apply and operate a blockchain node"
description: A player claims that the classic RTS' current iteration runs "Locus Game Chain" in the background when you're trying to play, "demanding 80-100% of your CPU".

title: Call of Duty players taken out by dangerous self-spreading malware
description: Malware targets Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II players.

title: Intel Arrow Lake CPUs are on track – and that’s crucial due to AMD’s big Ryzen 8000 threat
description: Next year is going to be a major clash of the CPU titans, and Intel can’t afford to be arriving late to the battlefield.

title: Samsung is already teasing an upgrade for the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6
description: Dust resistance is something that Samsung is working on, and it might make an appearance on the 2024 foldables.

title: Nikon Zf: what we want to see
description: The rumored retro full-frame 'Nikon Zf' could be the camera for photography and design lovers in 2023

title: The Samsung Galaxy Ring could go into production as soon as next month
description: It's looking more and more likely that Samsung is going to launch a smart ring within the next 12 months.

title: ICYMI: the week's biggest tech news, from Samsung Unpacked to DJI's new drone
description: If you missed the week's biggest tech news, fear not – we've picked out all the best stories, including Samsung Unpacked.

title: New phishing campaign targets Twitter Blue users amid X rebrand confusion
description: Twitter Blue subscribers are being targeted with fake migration service amid company rebrand to X.

title: Google Bard content should be fact-checked, recommends current Google VP
description: In a BBC interview, the vice president of Google UK states the AI meant more for collaborations and creative pursuits.
